      • getBooleanValue

        public static boolean getBooleanValue(String value)
        Get a string as a boolean. Returns the value true if the string argument is not null and is equal, ignoring case, to the string "true". Returns false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        value - Original string
        Returns:
        true or false

      • getNullValue

        public static String getNullValue(String value)
        Convert string possibly containing a 'null' string to a null value Returns the value null if the property argument is not null and is equal, ignoring case, to the string "null". Returns the value otherwise.
        Parameters:
        value - Original string
        Returns:
        the value or null

        Returns:

        public static boolean isListValue(String value)
        Does the specified string value represent a delimited list with a default delimiter of ','
        Parameters:
        value - String value to test
        Returns:
        true if the default delimiter was found in the string value, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getListValue

        public static ArrayList<String> getListValue(String value)
        Convert a delimited string value to an ArrayList. Uses ',' as the default separator.
        Parameters:
        value - Original string
        Returns:
        Array of string values, or null if no values are present
